adrFormatAddress: 793 6th Ave, New York, NY 10001-6303, USA

editorialSummary.text: Charming, plant-filled Korean BBQ restaurant with live cooking stations, hot pot & budae jjigae.

originalText.text:
Nangman BBQ truly offers an amazing experience, exceeding expectations in every aspect.

Firstly, the food was simply outstanding. The selection of pork belly was incredibly good, and the dishes were meticulously prepared. The unique flavor and aroma from grilling over charcoal were a delightful surprise, and the variety of sauces complemented the meat perfectly.

On the service front, Nangman BBQ boasts a team of professionals. The staff always greeted guests with warm smiles, and their attention to detail throughout the meal was remarkable. This ensured a comfortable dining experience, allowing me and my friend to fully enjoy the meal.

The atmosphere was nothing short of enchanting. The indoor setting was filled with romantic lighting, creating a cozy ambiance, and the camping-style marshmallow dessert added an extra layer of charm to the dining experience. Spending time here felt truly special, making it an ideal place to share with friends or a significant other.

Nangman BBQ excels in food quality, service, and ambiance. My experience here left a lasting impression, and it's sure to be a cherished memory. If you're seeking a place for a memorable moment, I highly recommend Nangman BBQ.

originalText.text: Go here!!!! The food was so good. Had the pork jawl and duck loin which I never had before and if you like fatty tasty meat then you’ll love it. Sides were great with the meal. Also had the second fried rice which I had to take Togo eyes were bigger than stomach. Jay the owner was hands on and such a pleasure. Will return without a doubt.

text.text: Go here!!!! The food was so good. Had the pork jawl and duck loin which I never had before and if you like fatty tasty meat then you’ll love it. Sides were great with the meal. Also had the second fried rice which I had to take Togo eyes were bigger than stomach. Jay the owner was hands on and such a pleasure. Will return without a doubt.

originalText.text: We went during restaurant week for lunch. Food was amazingly good, portions matched the price. Service was also very good, the server was overly nice and explained the side dishes well. We even got to roaat marshmellows over the fire. I would definitely come again!

text.text: We went during restaurant week for lunch. Food was amazingly good, portions matched the price. Service was also very good, the server was overly nice and explained the side dishes well. We even got to roaat marshmellows over the fire. I would definitely come again!

originalText.text: Just had a lovely lunch/dinner here! The manager and our server treated us so well and the food was absolutely delicious. I love that they have extractors and are conscious about which meat will slow down the cooking process so they switch out the grills cohesively. We will definitely be back.

text.text: Just had a lovely lunch/dinner here! The manager and our server treated us so well and the food was absolutely delicious. I love that they have extractors and are conscious about which meat will slow down the cooking process so they switch out the grills cohesively. We will definitely be back.

originalText.text:
During my recent travels, NANGMAN BBQ left an indelible mark as the most memorable dining experience. The Teriyaki Chicken Burger from the lunch special menu was not only a standout dish but has become the reason I eagerly anticipate my next visit.

Service (★★★★★)
From the moment I entered, the staff's warm welcome set the tone for an exceptional experience. The tables were consistently clean, and the efficiency in delivering orders showcased a commitment to outstanding service. The attentive and friendly waitstaff went above and beyond to make the dining experience truly delightful.

Food (★★★★★)
The Teriyaki Chicken Burger, part of the lunch special menu, was a culinary masterpiece. The perfectly glazed teriyaki chicken, complemented by fresh vegetables, nestled between a soft, flavorful bun, created a taste sensation that lingered long after the meal. The BBQ experience was equally impressive, with high-quality cuts of meat and an array of delectable sauces. Notably, the teriyaki chicken left an unforgettable impression with its exquisite flavor.

Ambiance (★★★★★)
The restaurant's ambiance, characterized by a cute and fun glamping style, heightened the overall dining experience. The background music added a delightful touch, creating an inviting atmosphere that contributed to the restaurant's charm.

Overall, NANGMAN BBQ has become synonymous with exceptional dining in my travel memories. The desire to revisit and savor the Teriyaki Chicken Burger again is so strong that it's already on my list for the next journey. It's more than just a restaurant; it's a culinary destination with a glamping twist that promises an unforgettable experience. I wholeheartedly recommend NANGMAN BBQ to fellow travelers and food enthusiasts seeking a perfect blend of quality, service, and memorable flavors.
